thread.title: Equal Earth Brand Ambassador Eric Lagerstrom Selected to Represent Team USA at the 2015 Pan American Games
thread.title_full: Equal Earth Brand Ambassador Eric Lagerstrom Selected to Represent Team USA at the 2015 Pan American Games

author: PRWEB
title: Equal Earth Brand Ambassador Eric Lagerstrom Selected to Represent Team USA at the 2015 Pan American Games
text:
we are honored to be partnered with someone of his caliber San Diego, CA (PRWEB) July 09, 2015
Equal Earth, a diversified renewable energy company, today announced that brand ambassador Eric Lagerstrom has been selected to represent Team USA at the 2015 Pan American Games, taking place July 11-12, 2015. After a colossal win at the 2015 Escape from Alcatraz triathlon and two wins at Continental Cups this racing season, Eric Lagerstrom was more than deserving of this honor. Eric will make his debut alongside a distinguished group of teammates including four time U.S. Olympian, Hunter Kemper and Kevin McDowell.
Held every four years in the year preceding the Olympic Games, the Pan American Games are the third largest international multi-sport games after the Olympic Games and the Asian Games.
“Eric sets the bar high and continues to reach it each and every time,” said Andrew Duggan, Chairman and CEO of Equal Earth. “Eric’s work ethic and attention to detail are what sets him apart from other competitors. These traits exemplify the values that are important to us at Equal Earth, we are honored to be partnered with someone of his caliber,” added Duggan.
Caution regarding forward-looking statements
About Equal Earth, Inc.
Equal Earth is a leading provider of solar systems for homes, businesses and government organizations. We help customers to gain their energy independence and reduce their electricity bills with clean solar power that costs less than expensive utility rates. We offer customers the opportunity to take control of future energy costs while contributing to a cleaner planet. Learn more about how we are helping change the way the world is powered at http://www.equalearthcorp.com .
